function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High exposure to and sharing of fake news in specific population sub-sections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control on the spreading of false content due to social dynamics","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Healthcare system miscommunication leading to inaccurate understanding of epidemic seriousness and required resources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public misunderstanding of epidemic complexity and risk analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Centralized or de-centralized risk communication management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete or inaccurate information conveyed from government to the public","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unrealistic public demands leading to frustration for the government","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of expertise and evidence-based decision-making in risk management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in government decisions, policies, and important updates","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Elevated risk perception influenced by media attention and social media discourse","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid transmission of covid-19 due to human-to-human interaction","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation and truthfulness of information perceived","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Communication challenges in effectively informing the public","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to accurate information leading to misinformation and panic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cybersecurity breaches leading to dissemination of false information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced air pollution from lockdown may lead to complacency and a return to high pollution levels post-lockdown.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in power consumption during lockdown may lead to a surge in power demand post-lockdown, potentially straining the power grid.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industries producing essential health care products may still be at risk of infection spread due to close proximity of workers","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shipping problems and supply chain disruptions leading to revenue losses for vendors and small businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Drastic reduction in air traffic due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Government decision making complexity leading to delays in pandemic response","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to tracking super spreaders and individuals for contact tracing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Psychological impact of prolonged quarantine on mental health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variability in testing techniques and accuracy of results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in demand for testing kits","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai and ml in predicting infection spreading rates and diagnosing diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying solely on online information from verified sources may lead to incomplete or biased understanding of the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elimination of works that may contain relevant information may result in oversight of key insights or developments in pandemic control","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential bias in the selection and scrutiny of works may result in a skewed representation of the available information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to lack of effective technological measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of remote working and distance learning technologies","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Investigation of various implemented technologies and their influence in controlling the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective use of masks and lack of knowledge on mask usage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to adhere to social distancing and isolation measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited control over infection spread despite combined efforts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective treatment and vaccine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient public adherence to preventive measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of disease agent life cycles in urban settings","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of water feature design in urban areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsuitable selection of tree species in highly populated areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction or reestablishment of new species in urban areas fostering the transmission of vector-borne and zoonotic diseases","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Designing water features in a way that limits mosquito breeding and algal growth, but increases the danger for children and pets","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Maintaining undisturbed vegetation around a pond providing habitat for rats and other rodents","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of exotic species causing new allergies among urban residents","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High levels of air pollutants in urban areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mechanical interaction between air pollutants and pollen grains","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High allergenicity of ornamental plant pollen","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overabundance of specific plant species in urban vegetation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited dispersion of pollen due to road-side tree planting","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased pollen exposure due to urban green space","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
